mapper.sql: XM_ID, XMLX, XMZM, GLXMMCID, XMMC, XMBH, XMKSSJ, SMJSSJ, XMJLTS, XMCC, JFLY, ZJJE, XMGK, XMZZJH, JLMBJGMC, ZYSM, SFXZRS, JHRS, CCXZ, XMNJXZ, YYYQ, XMZYXZ, GSYXDM, GSYXMC, GSXSDM, GSXSXM, OPERATOR_CODE, BMJZSJ, STATUS, VALID, CREATE_TIME, YYYQSM, GBDQ, FYBZ
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from T_XM
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from T_XM where XM_ID = #{xmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VALID = 1
mapper.insert: insert into T_XM (XM_ID, XMLX, XMZM, GLXMMCID, XMMC, XMBH, XMKSSJ, SMJSSJ, XMJLTS, XMCC, JFLY, ZJJE, XMGK, XMZZJH, JLMBJGMC, ZYSM, SFXZRS, JHRS, CCXZ, XMNJXZ, YYYQ, XMZYXZ, GSYXDM, GSYXMC, GSXSDM, GSXSXM, OPERATOR_CODE, BMJZSJ, STATUS, VALID, CREATE_TIME, YYYQSM, GBDQ, FYBZ) values (#{xmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmzm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{glxmmcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmkssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{smjssj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xmjlts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{xmcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jfly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjje,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmgk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmzzjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jlmbjgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zysm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfxzrs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jhrs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ccxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmnjxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmzyxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gsyxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gsyxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gsxsdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gsxsxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmjzsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{yyyqsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gbdq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fybz,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
